predicate.note: Frames file for 'list' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry.

example.name: listed-in
example.text: The Tokyo Stock Price Index (Topix) of all issues listed *trace* in the First Section, which gained 16.05 points Tuesday, was down 1.46 points, or 0.05%, at 2691.19.

example.name: listed-on
example.text: Armstrong's shares, also listed *trace* on the Big Board, closed at $39.125, up 12.5 cents.

example.name: listed-as
example.text: Actually, about two years ago, the Journal listed the creation of the money fund as one of the 10 most significant events in the world of finance in the 20th century.
example.arg: the creation of the money fund
one of the 10 most significant events in the world of finance in the 20th century

example.name: listed-at
example.text: To confuse matters further, when UAL Corp. stock finally opened on the New York Stock Exchange at 11:08 a.m., the price was listed *trace* at $324.75 a share, up about $45 from Friday; in fact, its true price was $224.75, down $55.

example.name: earthquake damage
example.text: At a nearby corner, they swerve perilously close to a listing apartment house, oblivious to any danger.
